price: On od vode stvara ljude i čini da su rod po krvi i po tazbini. – Gospodar tvoj je kadar sve.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ بَشَرٗا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبٗا وَصِهۡرٗاۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī khalaqa mina al-māi basharan fajaʿalahu nasaban waṣih'ran wakāna rabbuka qadīran
